name: Under Construction (Code Addict)
description:
Under Construction is an indie horror title made only by me using Horror Engine. 

Game now only has 1 completed level and the second one that is in the making.

You are a worker at a construction site that is renovating a hotel. Everything was fine and you went to work that day but when you arrived nobody was there. As soon as you start to explore the hotel you will see why everybody has left.

You will need to find 2 keys in order to get to the next zone. The papers you find will guide your way!

Controls:

Standard WASD movement

Left mouse button - Primary action

Right mouse button - Secondary action

TAB - Inventory

F - Flashlight

V - Lighter

TIP: You should always read papers that you find in the game.

PLEASE NOTE ANY BUGS YOU FIND DURING YOUR PLAY SESSION! THANK YOU.
